name: Match-3 Line Wars
description:
******* Free Wars Match-3 Game! ***********

***** Intense Power-Busting Action **********

Treat yourself to the fiercest match-3 game experience that has come to the App Store.

Match and detonate as many power balls as you can in 60 action-packed seconds. Release and match 3 or more elements to create cascades of power and solve various levels in this compelling puzzle adventure. This is a fast-paced game that is sure to get you addicted. Brace yourself for challenging stages as you level up.

With waves of excitement in every slide, expect a thrilling match-3 experience that will keep you hooked for a long time!

Features:

* Puzzles that develop logic and faster thinking
* Stunning graphics
* Color-rich gameplay
* Multiple power-ups to unlock
* Fun for all ages

Taking match-3 to the extreme!

Download FREE Today!
